item.title: Withdrawing Anti-TNF in IBD Remission: New Data
item.description: A Spanish trial finds similar sustained IBD clinical remission rates 1-year post-withdrawal vs maintenance of anti-TNF therapy. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Benefits of Oral Food Allergy Treatment Emerge Later
item.description: A meta-analysis showed a significant effect on quality of life 1 year after treatment ended. Medscape Medical News
